meanings.definition: A substance used to promote the healing of wounds.
meanings.sent1: She applied vulneraries to her cut to help it heal faster.
meanings.sent2: Hospitals often keep a supply of vulneraries for treating injuries.
meanings.sent3: The bandage soaked in vulneraries made the wound feel like it was getting a magical hug.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as vulneraries to her broken heart, soothing the pain.
meanings.sent5: The vulneraries worked like little healers, stitching up the wound with invisible thread.

meanings.definition: A plant or herb with healing properties.
meanings.sent1: The garden was full of vulneraries like aloe vera and lavender.
meanings.sent2: People have used vulneraries like chamomile for centuries to aid in healing.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to think the vulneraries were catnip, rolling around in the healing herbs.
meanings.sent4: The vulneraries in the garden bloomed like tiny doctors, ready to cure any ailment.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the vulneraries filled the air, promising relief and restoration.
